message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $10,000.  Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low at this time.  The product holds significant value to me, and I'm looking to get closer to $9,500. Let's see if we can find a middle ground that works for both of us.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $9,000, which is the highest I can go while staying within my budget. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
